title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course Through Production System Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic production system theory and spreadsheet application skills
context.additional_context: Designing practice-centered education leveraging adult learners' work experience

learning_goals: Learners can solve job batch optimization problems using simulation models of production systems
Learners can autonomously operate the design-execute-analyze-improve cycle through spreadsheet-based interfaces
Learners can provide decision-making rationales by quantitatively analyzing data derived from simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
